results.description: Aston Villa sign Brazilian midfielder Douglas Luiz from Manchester City for £15m - their 10th summer signing.
results.shortTitle: Villa sign £15m Luiz from Man City
results.title: Douglas Luiz: Aston Villa sign £15m Man City midfielder

results.description: Girona sign Leeds United midfielder Samu Saiz for an undisclosed fee on a three-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Midfielder Saiz leaves Leeds for Girona
results.title: Samu Saiz: Girona sign midfielder from Leeds for undisclosed fee

results.description: Real Madrid miss the chance to go second in La Liga as Girona come from behind to record a surprise away win at the Bernabeu.
results.shortTitle: Real suffer shock home loss to Girona
results.title: Real Madrid 1-2 Girona: Sergio Ramos sent off in shock La Liga defeat

results.description: Follow live text commentary as Real Madrid look to go second in La Liga as they play Girona at the Bernabeu.
results.shortTitle: Girona shock Real Madrid as Ramos sent off
results.title: La Liga: Real Madrid v Girona - live text coverage

results.description: Karim Benzema scores twice to move up to sixth in Real Madrid's all-time top goalscorers as his side beat Girona in the Copa del Rey.
results.shortTitle: Benzema double helps Real into semis
results.title: Girona 1-3 Real Madrid (3-7 on aggregate): Karim Benzema up to sixth in Real's top scorers

results.description: Lionel Messi score his 26th goal of the season as Barcelona re-establish their five point lead at the top of La Liga with victory over 10-man Girona.
results.shortTitle: Messi strikes as Barca reopen lead at top
results.title: Girona 0-2 Barcelona: Lionel Messi strikes as Barca reopen lead at top

results.description: Follow live text coverage from La Liga as Barcelona travel to Estadi Montilivi to face Girona.
results.title: La Liga: Girona v Barcelona

results.description: Barcelona end plans to play Girona in a La Liga fixture in Miami due to a "lack of consensus" between stakeholders.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona scrap plans for Miami fixture
results.title: Barcelona scrap plans to face Girona in Miami in January

results.description: Manchester City winger Patrick Roberts, who is on loan at La Liga club Girona, says players "can't discredit playing abroad".
results.shortTitle: Playing abroad is great - Man City winger on life at Girona
results.title: Patrick Roberts: Manchester City winger loving life in Spain after loan move to Girona

results.description: Atletico Madrid miss the chance to go top of La Liga after drawing with Girona.
results.shortTitle: Girona deny Atletico chance to go top
results.title: Girona 1-1 Atletico Madrid: Catalans deny Atletico chance to go top

results.description: La Liga is taking the Spanish Football Association (RFEF) to court in its fight to play Girona's home league game against Barcelona in Miami.
results.shortTitle: La Liga goes to court over Miami match
results.title: La Liga takes Spanish FA to court over battle to play Girona-Barcelona in Miami

results.description: La Liga's hopes of holding a game in the United States look less likely after the Fifa Council said it was opposed to the idea.
results.shortTitle: Fifa Council opposes La Liga game in US
results.title: La Liga game in Miami: Fifa Council opposed to the idea

results.description: Barcelona and Girona's proposed La Liga game in Miami is not certain to happen, says one of the men behind the idea.
results.shortTitle: Organisers not certain of La Liga game in US
results.title: La Liga game in United States: Organisers not certain Girona v Barcelona will be moved

results.description: Gerard Pique rescues Barcelona in a pulsating Catalan derby against Girona after Clement Lenglet is shown a red card at the Nou Camp.
results.title: Barcelona 2-2 Girona: Gerard Pique equaliser earns hosts point

thumbnail.altText: Gerard Pique celebrates equalising for Barcelona

results.description: Plans to play top flight competitive Spanish games in North America are only part of a plan for worldwide growth.
results.title: Spain's La Liga sets global goals

results.description: Text commentary from La Liga and Serie A as Barcelona host Girona, while Juventus are away to Frosinone.
results.shortTitle: European football: Barcelona & Juventus in action
results.title: Follow live text commentary of Barcelona v Girona & Frosinone v Juventus

results.description: Barcelona, Girona and La Liga ask the Spanish Football Federation for permission for the two Catalan clubs to relocate a match to the US.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona & Girona ask permission for US game
results.title: La Liga, Barcelona & Girona ask Spanish FA for US game permission

results.description: Players will have the final say on plans to play Girona's 'home' match against Barcelona in Miami, according to the Spanish players' union.
results.shortTitle: 'Players will have final say on US game'
results.title: La Liga US game - players to have final say on Girona v Barcelona, says union

results.description: La Liga side Girona confirm they are in talks about moving their game against Barcelona to the United States.
results.title: Girona confirm discussions over US La Liga match

results.description: Gareth Bale scores for the second successive La Liga game to help Real Madrid come from behind to beat Girona in La Liga.
results.shortTitle: Bale inspires Real to comeback win
results.title: Girona 1-4 Real Madrid: Gareth Bale on target for second successive game

thumbnail.altText: Gareth Bale celebrates scoring for Real Madrid
